## ✅ 质量检查 | Quality Checklist

- [ ] 游戏可以正常运行 | Game runs properly

- [ ] 响应式设计 | Responsive design
- [ ] 无控制台错误 | No console errors
- [ ] 注释清晰 | Clear comments
- [ ] 遵循项目代码规范 | Follows project code standards
- [ ] 包含必要的文档 | Includes necessary documentation
